source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Blender 2.8 Creating your First 3D Game Model
items.headline: Learn to model, UV-unwrap, texture & render a basic game-ready well in Blender 2.8
objectives_summary: Following through a complete guide on creating a stone well
Following through a complete guide on making your first game-ready model of a well
Using Blender 2.8 and understand its interface

items.title: Writing a Script for Animation in Adobe Story
items.headline: Learn How to Come Up With A Great Story And Turn It Into A Script In Professional Format
objectives_summary: Come up with great stories for their animations
Develop interesting characters and interesting plots for the narrative
Turn their story into a script in professional format

items.title: Rigging and Animating in Adobe Animate
items.headline: Rig and animate 2D characters using symbols, Motion Tweening and layer parenting!
objectives_summary: Successfully rig and animate a full character using Layer Parenting, Symbols and Motion Tweening

items.title: 3ds Max Zero to Hero: The Complete Guide To 3D Modeling
items.headline: Learn the foundations of 3ds Max to start modeling, texturing, lighting and rendering things from imagination.
objectives_summary: 3d modeling
3d rendering
texturing

items.title: VFX Compositing Elements Photorealistically in Nuke
items.headline: Learn the tricks and techniques to push your VFX Compositing to the next level.  Use elements and integrate them.
objectives_summary: Understand exposure and how to make something look photographic
Concepts of exponential glow and quadratic falloff of light
Finding good reference, picking up on key traits from it

items.title: Looping Animations in After Effects for Beginners
items.headline: Create a simple looping Hamburger in After Effects. Perfect for the beginner motion graphics artist.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have a great understanding of how to create basic animations.
Basic After Effects navigation.
How to create a simple looping animation.

items.title: Girl and the Dog Creation in Zbrush for Intermediate Level
items.headline: model female characters with clothing, accessories, guns and knives and even a dog in Zbrush from start to finish.
objectives_summary: Sculpting the Female Head
Sculpting the Female Body
Sculpting the Dog

items.title: MAYA Master Class - Complete Guide to 3D Animation in Maya
items.headline: Learn everything you need for 3D animation in Autodesk Maya: Modeling, Texturing, Lighting, Rigging, Animating, Dynamics
objectives_summary: You will learn to build and design your own 3D objects in Autodesk Maya
You will learn modeling, rigging, animating, shading, texturing, lighting beautiful designs in Maya
Become comfortable with Maya

items.title: Weapon Modeling & Texturing For Game for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: Learn Modeling, Sculpting, Retopology, UV Unwrapping & Texturing for beginners in Maya, Zbrush & Substance Painter
objectives_summary: Modeling Weapons in Maya
Sculpting Weapon Details in Zbrush
Retopology High Poly Meshes in Maya

items.title: Unity 3D & Maya: Create & Submit Art to Unity Asset Store
items.headline: A step-by-step guide to selling your character designs in the Unity Asset Store.
objectives_summary: Make Money Using the Top Programs in the Video Game Industry!
Model, Animate and Submit Your Creations for Sale to Millions of Developers!
Build High Quality 3D Models For Your Own Projects.

items.title: 3Ds MAX + VRAY 5 + Interior 3D Rendering
items.headline: From Beginner to Advanced: Lighting, Material and Rendering
objectives_summary: Camera placement and setting to achieve high quality renders
Installment of different types of natural and artificial lights (VRAY SKY, VRAY Light etc ...) and optimal setting and adjustment tips
Render setup tips to get realistic and sharp looking interior renders

items.title: BLENDER: How to create and rig the Iron Giant
items.headline: learn how to create THE IRON GIANT we will discuss modeling, unwrapping, Rigging, Texturing and Rendering with Blender
objectives_summary: modeling the Iron giant from start to finish
unwrapping the whole model from start to finish
Rigging, we will learn how to rig the robot so you can make it ready to animation

items.title: Cinema 4D Complete : Vol. 1 The Essentials
items.headline: Master the essentials of Cinema 4D
objectives_summary: The basics of Cinema 4D
Understand how 3D works
How to master the interface

items.title: Learn iClone 7 | Character Creator | Unreal Engine Pipeline
items.headline: Learn The Powerful Workflow Of Character Creator 3 to iClone To Unreal Engine & Create Amazing Characters & Animations!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to jump into iClone 7 and get a FAST start to animating your characters
Learn how to create an original 3D Character in Character Creator 3
Learn how to send your character to iClone 7 ready for animation

items.title: Cinema 4D - Learning Cinema 4D from Scratch
items.headline: Learn how to create and animate 3D Graphics using Cinema 4D
objectives_summary: Learn professional 3d graphics quickly and effectively in Cinema 4D
Learn how to create special effects with Cinema 4D
Learn to master Cinema 4D

items.title: Learn the ART of ZBrush

visible_instructors.job_title: Game Developer, Creative Director and Writer
visible_instructors.name: Kevin
visible_instructors.title: Kevin Oxland

items.headline: Learn to sculpt environment props, objects and creatures in ZBrush.
objectives_summary: Learn to Use ZBrush in a professional capacity, with emphasis on environment objects, props and creatures.
